name: Medusa PoC
description:
A small, incomplete VR concept developed for BGSjam XVI. Navigate a large maze, peek around corners with your mirror, and collect treasure. Requires SteamVR.

Currently the AI doesn't exist, those drones you should avoid just randomly navigate around the maze.

Bindings for Index Controllers are included but may not work. Other controllers should rebind the Movement control in the SteamVR settings to a joystick or touchpad.

Source code: https://git.hellocld.com/bgsjam-xvi/log.html
